website_summaries.verdict: A nice looking traditional toaster that will deliver your toast reliably at a good price.
pros: Wide slots for a small toaster
Self-centering function on the toaster helps to get the breads toasted evenly every time
cons: Fits many wider breads, but slots are are still not as wide as some on the market

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe Product. Burn Hazard
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this product for a little over a month. My wife said the outside of this toaster gets really really hot. I didnt think anything of as we only use a toaster a couple times a month. After using it yesterday morning i had to reach behind it to access a power outlet and with a glancing contact on my wrist gave me a pretty painful burn. See attache picture. Not a safe product.
customer_reviews.author: wdawson

customer_reviews.title: A Fine Toaster and Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete rewrite of an earlier negative review. I had a problem with this toaster (half the heating elements stopped working) but after writing a negative review, I was immediately contacted by customer service. They expressed concern over my problem, and immediately sent me a new toaster and a pre-paid label so I could return the old one. So despite the issue I had, B+D supports their product completely, which is pretty awesome. The toaster itself is very good. It feels a little lightweight compared to other toasters I've had, but the slots are very wide and fairly deep, so I can fit slices of homemade bread in easily. Toasting is even and it heats up pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Avallone

customer_reviews.title: Burner Not Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be a good buy because I was only making one serving and the toast was turning out good. One morning my wife was making toast for the family breakfast. First batch was good, second batch was too dark so she turned down the setting, third batch was burnt. You can’t make consecutive portions of toast with this toaster without a lengthy cool down period between portions. I threw away the box or I would return it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: W Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and affordable toaster with no frills, just function
customer_reviews.text: I considered several toasters available on Amazon before purchasing this model. I am very pleased with the decision I made. It is simple, no frills, and attractive. You won't find fancy functions on this toaster, but you will find a reliable, good-looking toaster that takes up a small footprint on your countertop. It fits bagels and toast (of various thicknesses) just fine and toasts them to perfection. If you are looking for an affordable toast with stylish looks, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Taj

customer_reviews.title: Really does work for bagels or bread - nice even toasting
customer_reviews.text: My toaster over started getting moody - time to replace. I realized that all I ever did with it was toast stuff, so I checked out toasters - smaller and cheaper than toaster ovens. This one toasts evenly and handles things of different thicknesses very well. It's small, relatively inexpensive, and nice looking. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Not Truly Wide Slot..Beware false advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in a scratch/dent to the original packaging and it arrived as stated. My main complaint is that I tried to insert a piece of bread cut from a whole loaf that was extra wide and it would not fit. It takes a normal width slice of bread OK. Have not tried a bagel half but I am doubtful. The sides of the toaster become unusually hot so not perhaps a great toaster to be be used with kids or elderly.!!! If I did not need a toaster in general I would return it. Now I feel stuck! I do not recommend this item for the above reasons
customer_reviews.author: fletzie

customer_reviews.title: only good for two years
customer_reviews.text: Always tight, after two years the slider became so stiff we hate to use it. Gave up and bought a toaster oven as replacement. I did like it at first because it was very good at toasting my narrow quarter-inch bread evenly. I think a toaster should last more than two years.
customer_reviews.author: hoodeejudy

customer_reviews.title: Toasteriffic
customer_reviews.text: It toasts. Bread, English muffins. You put the bread in, and depress the plunger, and amazingly, you get miracle toasted bread when the toast cycle is over. I don't drink, but if I did, I would raise a glass of champagne and toast this toaster. It is a nice looking toaster, and toasts the other toasters when it comes to appearance. If you have teenagers and a loaf of bread or two, this unit would be perfect prep to send them off into the good night to see Rocky Horror. Or on a Saturday in fall, a Penn football game. Get toasted with this insane little machine. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: J Christopher Frey

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sensor
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for 2 slices of bread, but only 2. You set it and toast it and its great. You put in the 2nd set and they come out completely untoasted. So you put it back in...lower the setting, and they come out black. So you start over. Now despite the setting you don't know if they'll be charcoal or warm bread. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Joy S. Witte

customer_reviews.title: Fairly quick, top gets HOT (edited: it either burns or doesn't toast)
customer_reviews.text: The top area around the slots gets VERY hot. Toasts in pretty good time. Looks nice and the quick eject button is handy. So far it's been reliable and you can (just) fit a bagel in there, even a small to medium sized hamburger bun, which is convenient. Over the last year and a half the toaster has gotten pretty 'binary' with its toasting performance. Somewhere between setting 4 and 5 is 'not toasted at all' and 'charcoal-izer'. Everything above it sure-burn and everything below is 'wasting your time'. And again, the top gets frying pan hot so that it's browned like you'd expect to see from jet exhaust ports.
customer_reviews.author: BillzillaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not Safe To Use
customer_reviews.text: When the toaster came, I tried to use it and immediately saw that it is not safe to use. Whenever I would put something inside, the sides would get EXTREMELY hot, and is not safe to touch or handle. I know that sometimes the toaster can get heated, but this was different. I am quite dissatisfied with quality of this toaster and returned it. I don’t know if all the toasters are defective or only I got a bad piece, but I will now purchase one from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Meghana Gokhale

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster!
customer_reviews.text: After our old toaster died I spent a week reading toaster reviews and finally went with this one. We’ve had it a month and the whole family is delighted. I bake huge loaves of organic whole wheat bread and the wide slices fit in this toaster and toast up nice and crunchy. I went with Black And Decker in hopes that it would be as solid and heavy duty as its tools and I’m not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Kohnen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a big fan of Black & Decker products. This toaster was disappointing overall. The outside of the toaster gets extremely hot and you can burn yourself unless you're careful not to touch it. Also, it toasts the bread unevenly. One side darkens or burns while the other side of the bread doesn't get any color at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Conrad

customer_reviews.title: It's a toaster
customer_reviews.text: It looks ... fashionable and simple, and ... like a toaster. It works ... simple and effective, and ... like a toaster. It's simple to use, easy to clean, and seems to be of great value ... for a toaster. Don't let the humor fool you. It's five stars in my book, which means it gets the Mad Dawg double bark of approval!!
customer_reviews.author: Mad Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Another Dud
customer_reviews.text: well, sad to say, this toaster is just as bad as the previous one. toasts the top half, not the bottom. you CAN make toast by hovering over it, guessing when the top half is toast-like, popping it up and putting the bread back in upside down. Toaster are just a crapshoot. Years ago, i had a black and decker that toasted beautifully for almost four years, I miss it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Kotler

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it! Terrible toaster
customer_reviews.text: Worse toaster ever! Dont buy it! Its junk! Cant belive in this day and age we can even get a toaster to work correctly! I mean, C'mon we almost have flying cars being created!!! Burns one half of the ego waffle while the other side is raw. Worst toaster ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice- somewhat wide
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this because it said extra wide slots. I can’t say that the slots are extra wide. I would say that they are wide, but not wide enough for a really BIG bagel. A regular sized bagel does fit in the slots. It’s a nice looking toaster. And it goes well with my other stainless steel appliances. I use the same stainless steel cleaner on the outside of this toaster as I do on my other stainless steel appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Erahimi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't toast evenly
customer_reviews.text: I should've listening to the reviews. Also it got brown between the slots after 3 rounds of toast and won't clean. I would've sent it back but threw away the box and was desperate for toast in quarantine. Hard to keep shiny. I wanted a pretty silver toaster for the counter and when it arrived I had high hopes. I have to moniter and turn the bread so it toasts nicely which it does with a bit of help.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell, most of elements don't work
customer_reviews.text: Terrible chemical smell, most of elements don't work. Too hot to touch for several minutes after use. Returning product. Very disappointing as our last toaster was Black and Decker, worked great and lasted for many years.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Toast of the town
customer_reviews.text: You think toast is boring? Not with this beast. It’s like Disneyland, but instead it’s toast. For real, Al Pacino can do no wrong compared to this toaster. This ain’t no Bing Crosby toasting machine. This is Lil Wayne and Barbara Streisand combined into one, holy, toast-making being. You want good toast? Get it here, folks. This sick mfer can make light toast. It can make dark toast. It can make medium toast. If you forget to start it, it can even make no toast at all.
customer_reviews.author: vdonahue

customer_reviews.title: Entire unit gets HOT
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking toaster, seems to work well, but every inch of this toaster gets HOT during use. I burned my thumb on part of it the first time I used it, and I won't allow my kids to be anywhere near it when in use. I realize the entire casing is stainless steel but I assumed from other reviews and product description that it was the top part near the slots that got hot. Nope - it's the entire unit. Definitely not recommended if you have children in the house!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Lane

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS - DANGEROUS AND BAD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I feel compelled to write about how terrible this toaster is because it is genuinely a safety hazard and is a prime example of poor design and manufacturing. Safety hazard - while toasting or any time within 10 minutes of use, you cannot touch anything on the toaster except the end button without burning yourself. Even the sides are burn hazards. Toasting - terrible. Does not toast equally on each side. Also I just left a piece of toast in for the full time on level three and the result was an entirely black piece of toast (see photo). I genuinely think the toast/toaster would set on fire at level 7.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No thermocouple!
customer_reviews.text: Five stars. Looks nice on the counter and doesn't (like my last toaster, replaced in the prime of its life) have a "safety feature" in the form of a thermocouple that prevents one's pushing the toast back down immediately if it's not yet toasted to perfection. Nice to be back in control of my breakfast!
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy

customer_reviews.title: Chemical odor
customer_reviews.text: Nope... has very bad odor thst did not go away
customer_reviews.author: Daffy

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster we've found!
customer_reviews.text: Over the last 9 years we have gone through as many toasters. I have paid as much as four times what I paid for this Black and Decker and found that that expensive toaster was no better than one for which I paid a little over $10. This Black and Decker toaster is the best one we've found. It toasts evenly and appears to be very sturdy. We've only had it a short time but so far it is the best we've found and a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t heat evenly and burns everything
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this toaster and the size. Have only had it for a few days but my family uses a toaster multiple times a day and every time we use it, our food is burned. On setting 2 and 3, poptarts, waffles and toast are all burned on one side and toaster leaves the house smelling like something is burning. Darn it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look for others
customer_reviews.text: Expected more from B&D. Flimsy to say the least. Not high enough to grab muffins after toasting. Settings need adjusting all the time. Sometimes too much others not enough. Outside requires cleaning constantly, fingerprints are hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Terri P.

customer_reviews.title: Pick something else honestly
customer_reviews.text: It works, I bought refurbished but I can tell why it was returned, the lever is bent so it’s a bit annoying. Also it’s difficult to lift the lever enough to get your toast out without burning your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I attached images of the toaster fresh out of the box - there are noticeable marks and smudges on the front that don’t wipe off. Otherwise it’s a decent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Dorland

customer_reviews.title: not happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I gave it all 2's because it will make ok toast as long as I stand there and keep an eye on it. It burns everything or doesn't cook half of it. Not pleased at all with it. I probably should give it a 1.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Has a 6" long slot
customer_reviews.text: The only toaster I could find with a 6" long slot. It accommodates the longer slices of bread that we get in order to get the multi-grain breads. I am pleased with the toast. It browns evenly and is simple to operate. The stay-option would be good.
customer_reviews.author: dban32

customer_reviews.title: Fave toaster
customer_reviews.text: Good easy clean toaster and wide enough for grilled cheese pockets!
customer_reviews.author: MomReview

customer_reviews.title: Works great, toasts bread, bagels, muffins, etc.
customer_reviews.text: We used to toast things in our Toaster Oven but it took too long. So we bought the BLACK+DECKER. Now it only take a few minutes to toast things and they are toasted much more evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Ted B

customer_reviews.title: frustration with junk
customer_reviews.text: We received this toaster on 4/27 and have only used it sparingly. In less than two months, no matter the setting, it burns everything. The Amazon window to return the item is only about a month and five times I tried to message Black and Decker but received nothing but an "Error'' message. We had a similar experience with another major manufacturer a number of years back so after 7 weeks we just threw this piece of junk out. I'm so done with Stanley and Black and Decker. They've gone from quality products to imported junk.
customer_reviews.author: rich doyle

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s not really that great. Doesn’t taste evenly and doesn’t dry out the middle of a English muffin enough to hold when the butter is put on it. Slots are not real wide.
customer_reviews.author: jmdallas

customer_reviews.title: great little toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster works great. It's a great value. No need to spend hundreds of dollars on a toaster. There's some weight to it . It feels quality and the bread comes out evenly toasted.
customer_reviews.author: W. Nunes

customer_reviews.title: It's better than old one
customer_reviews.text: Other than toasting more on one side than the other, works well. Important to note that different breads toast differently.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this toaster
customer_reviews.text: The outside of the toaster got so hot that I couldn't even touch it without burning myself. Not safe to use if I cant even touch the toaster to get my toast out. With first use it had a very strong electrical smell. Only used it once and will not use again. Very disappointed in this product. Never had issues like this with other cheaper toasters in the 25-35 dollar range.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Needed a toaster - this one toasts!
customer_reviews.text: You may want to try playing with the browning dial first to see what you get. Mine at half way or a little less gets the toast perfect. Any higher than half way and I get some burnt areas. YMMV
customer_reviews.author: Axel Saborio

customer_reviews.title: TWO sides!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy feeling toaster. Very nice looking. BUT what is with these toasters that do not toast evenly. You have to switch the bread around to get it to toast without burning.
customer_reviews.author: eyesofgreen

customer_reviews.title: Great Basic Toaster at first glance
customer_reviews.text: Look, I'm not trying to pay $200 for a toaster that literally does one thing, toast. Sure the sides get hot but what did you expect with a machine that toasts that is surrounded by steel + warnings on the pamphlet? It toasts my bread pretty evenly and looks quite nice in my kitchen. It's simple and looks like what you'd expect a toaster to look like!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Zhu

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted two months.
customer_reviews.text: I had this toaster for two months before it died. The lever will no longer stay down on it's own, and even if you hold it down it will only toast one side. Black and Decker won't reply to support requests. This toaster is absolute garbage, do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Gearing

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds My Needs
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a bagel setting but otherwise good results, even toasting a bagel.
customer_reviews.author: G. B. Josephson

customer_reviews.title: Top and sides get hit enough to cause a BURN
customer_reviews.text: Returned for a full refund. The entire thing gets overly hot. Enough so I burned myself on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous to use. Returned the day of.
customer_reviews.text: This toaster gets dangerously hot and will burn you wherever you touch it. The entire device get extremely hot even at half power, making it hazardous to use for kids as much as for adults. That's totally a one star for unsafe design.
customer_reviews.author: FRANCOIS SURCIN

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful toaster
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster to replace another toaster I had bought in Nov. of 2019, through Amazon. This toaster is far superior to the other one I bought. I am so satisfied. It works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice toaster
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my plastic toaster with this one because I liked the stainless steel look but find it gets very hot. Other then that I am satisfied with the toast it makes. Easy to use and great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Diane P.

customer_reviews.title: Unable to toast bagels
customer_reviews.text: The description is misleading..extra wide. This toaster is unable to toast a bagel. You’re only options are regular sliced bread and English muffins.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew V.

customer_reviews.title: Toast my buns nicely !
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to operate and toasts fast - works great if frozen bread/eggos/bagels Great value for the $$, no need to spend the crazy prices for other machines offered - this one is the way to go
customer_reviews.author: TSean

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Disposable, a piece of garbage! Kept the bread and burned it.
customer_reviews.author: Karla M

customer_reviews.title: modern and stylish
customer_reviews.text: great toaster. Just be avare if you have little kids on the sides it gets hot. so they could burn them self. But apart from that love it
customer_reviews.author: Jana Simkova

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: The toast comes out perfect and looks so good on my counter
customer_reviews.author: bridget

customer_reviews.title: Fits larger bread slices
customer_reviews.text: Our extra long bread fits in the slots! This is the only toaster we could find that has 6 1/2inch long slots instead of the common 5 1/2inch long slots on the others. Toasts perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Jones

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is a pretty shiny silver color and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Brishborn

customer_reviews.title: Not great...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple toaster, without a bunch of plastic parts and buttons, this looked like the closest affordable option. Unfortunately it heats very unevenly. It will burn one side of your toast before the other side begins to brown. It works, I guess, just not very well.
customer_reviews.author: M Roach

customer_reviews.title: Very hot exterior.
customer_reviews.text: The stainless steel exterior looks nice but is not insulated and the entire surface becomes hot. The ends are significantly hotter than the sides. We will be taking this to Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Slots
customer_reviews.text: The slots appear much larger in the pictures, I can barely squeeze a mini bagel sliced in half on each side. Very disappointed. So if you use this for anything other than thin toast don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: WT

customer_reviews.title: Even a frozen setting!! Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Beat expectations! I toast bread, English muffins, bagels and frozen waffles! All the settings help everything cook perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Moore Family

customer_reviews.title: Not extra large slots
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and cheap price. I’d say it’s a good value works well but not extra large slots
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: True to advertising, it does toast quickly. However, very wide variation in toasting strength, and toaster itself feels very flimsy. Surprising given it’s Black and Decker.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Slots are not extra wide as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This toaster was described as having extra wide slots but a bagel won’t even fit in the slot without me shoving it in.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Do-able.
customer_reviews.text: Bit cheap but does the job. Have to turn upside down to clean.
customer_reviews.author: T Morte

customer_reviews.title: The outside had greasy fingerprints
customer_reviews.text: The toaster is nice but when I opened the plastic bag and without even touching it, the 2 sides of the toaster had greasy fingerprints that I was not able to clean out. I tried soap, then detergent to no avail. I am worried about using anything else to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Covered in Dirt
customer_reviews.text: Arrived covered in dirt. Have not tested functionality yet. Will update with review later.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: its perfect
customer_reviews.text: wide deep long slots an extra lift feature for small pieces a pop up now button a firmly set dial, its not loose or wiggly its tightly made, you can tell it will last it looks cool, for a toaster
customer_reviews.author: derek greco

customer_reviews.title: Good bye
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster havent jad one issue. Looks very nice in kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: joe raymond

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. Have not heard any complaints. Must be OK.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Black

customer_reviews.title: Looks clean
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I’m doing a review on a toaster. But I like it. Looks nice, not so big and gets the job done. I reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Margot

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Reviews and ratings apparently mean nothing. Simply look at this toast! Returned immediately, buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT KORB

customer_reviews.title: Basic and works well
customer_reviews.text: If you want a basic toaster that works well, you've found it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It does not pop up on its own, EVER. I just need a toaster that won’t require me to stand and watch over my bread, and it has scorched it black the two times I did not come in to force it up.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good product just a little pricey comparing to others in the market
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster!
customer_reviews.text: It toasts bread. It does exactly what it's designed to do and looks good while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: seanbreeden

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Slightly bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Toasts uniformly. The size is slightly bigger than the average toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Siddhartha Dugar

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for a smaller toaster! Does the trick! Nothing fancy! Perfect for me to put in the cabinet when it’s not being used!
customer_reviews.author: Ravin Rettew

customer_reviews.title: Its hard to grab your toast.
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is hot to touch but the biggest issue I have is the pop up. New out of the box the handle seems to stick and the bread doesn't seem to pop up far enough to grab.
customer_reviews.author: Liza A. Clinger

customer_reviews.title: Beware -unsafe!
customer_reviews.text: Produce is not safe. The outside sides of the toaster got extremely hot, such that it burnt my hand when it touched the side of the toaster on very first use. Returned the item imediatly and spoke with Amazon customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster for the money
customer_reviews.text: Basic but very good at toasting at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: macbeth

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is terrible. Toast is either not toasted or burnt using the same setting. Very disappointed especially since I have bought other Black and Decker products before.
customer_reviews.author: VK

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a toaster ASAP but don’t use it much so I found this one and it’s been good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t have an ‘on’ indicator light. Toasts a little slow compared to previous b&d model we had.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Michael Wolynez

customer_reviews.title: Is not extra wide slots
customer_reviews.text: Cannot toast bagels but I opened and threw away all packaging before I realized it did not toast bagels. Very dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to be excited about...
customer_reviews.text: It is just a regular toaster. The price is good, but very flimsy and unpredictable with the results very time I've used it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Toaster- Gets VERY hot
customer_reviews.text: The toaster works well for the money. The only issue is it gets very very hot and stays hot for quite a while after using.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster
customer_reviews.text: We've had this toaster for a couple of months and we love it. I particularly like the defrost button for frozen waffles.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this toaster
customer_reviews.text: This is not the nicest toaster I have ever used, but it works very well and is not over complicated like so many are. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt McCrudden

customer_reviews.title: Love our Black & Decker toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toaster, we love it! And The stainless steel matches my kitchen appliances!
customer_reviews.author: Gail E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice toaster for the money, I am impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: toaster?
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a toaster... barely pops the bread up at full toast setting it needs 2 trys to toast it smells always like burning oil
customer_reviews.author: Stan Penton

customer_reviews.title: Great value toaster
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toaster. Simple, solid metal construction, does what it needs to do.
customer_reviews.author: Miron

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toaster and it lasted less than two months. Contacted Amazon and they were supposed to have the company call us - never did. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: No crumb tray
customer_reviews.text: There was no crumb tray included. I guess that is a separate purchase, which makes no sense.
customer_reviews.author: Faithe H. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Does not toast properly, either not enough to too much. Always have to move dial.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: For a toaster in this price range it is terrific. Wide enough for bagels and works great. Doesn't slide around when you are doing the settings and looks nice, too. No complaints. Have used it for about four months at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F. Bullinger

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: Came with a giant hole in the side, be very cautious about buying
customer_reviews.author: Aravindakrishna Ganapathy

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: It’s really dangerous because it gets very HOT after and during use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little easier to clean and slots could be a little wider.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Vokas

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works well but not as solid as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! Stopped working after 8 months of purchase...we did not use it daily!
customer_reviews.author: Clemencia

customer_reviews.title: Uneven toasting
customer_reviews.text: It only toast one side of the bread. The outside gets very hot!
customer_reviews.author: sumie5678

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER 2-Slice Extra Wide Slot Toaster, Classic, Stainless Steel, TR2400SD
product_meta.description: The BLACK+DECKER 2-Slice Toaster features extra-wide, self-centering slots to fit all types of breads, waffles, and bagels. One-touch buttons simplify operation, and the shade selection knob gives you control to make toast your way.
feature_bullets: Extra-Wide Slots - Fit bagels and large artisan breads with ease
Self-Centering Guides - The guides adjust to any width, keeping bread in the perfect toasting position
One-Touch Buttons - Easy operation for frozen and cancel functions
Shade Selector - Choose from seven toast shades with a simple knob
Pull Out Crumb Tray - Cleanup is easy and your counter stays crumb-free

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars610 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
